肝.definition: liver (CL:葉|叶[ye4]); (slang) to put in long hours, typically late into the night, playing (a video game); (of a video game) involving a lot of repetition in order to progress; grindy

肝火.definition: irascibility; irritability; (TCM) inflammation of the liver

肝腦塗地.definition: to offer one's life in sacrifice

肝腸寸斷.definition: lit. liver and guts cut to pieces (idiom); fig. grief-stricken

肝膽相照.definition: to treat one another with absolute sincerity (idiom); to show total devotion
